main.head: Handbark Academy
main.p: Alexander Nanitchkov was born in Sofia, Bulgaria and is now 31. A graduate of the Sofia Academy of Fine Arts, he has been painting traditional art for 12 years, favoring acrylic paints on canvas. Recently, he has started to delve deeper into digital art. He has been heavily influenced by the "old masters" and Asian artwork, and is now exploring conceptual environments and character design.
